kafka.zookeeper.label: Zookeeper Quorum
kafka.zookeeper.description: Specify the zookeeper connection string. E.g. host:2181,host2:2181,host3:2181. Either we can specify zookeeper quorum or broker list.

kafka.brokers.label: Kafka Brokers
kafka.brokers.description: Server names on which kafka server is running. Kafka is run as a cluster comprised of one or more servers each of which is called broker. Either we can specify zookeeper connection string or this configuration.

kafka.partitions.label: Number of Partitions
kafka.partitions.description: Specifies the number of partitions. Each partition is an ordered, immutable sequence of messages that is continually appended toâ€”a commit log. The messages in the partitions are each assigned a sequential id number called the offset that uniquely identifies each message within the partition

kafka.topic.label: Topic
kafka.topic.description: Topic you want to subscribe to. Kafka maintains feeds of messages in categories called topics

kafka.default.offset.label: Start Offset
kafka.default.offset.description: Specifies the start offset for processing from the queue
